---
title: "Analysis of Penguin Data"
author: "Ardeshir Pezeshk"
---

```{r}
#| label: packages
library(tidyverse)
```
Plot of relationship between flipper length and body mass
```{r}
#| label: test plot
#| warning: false
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = flipper_len, y = body_mass, color = species)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(x = "Flipper Length",
       y = "Mass in Grams",
       title = "Body Mass vs. Flipper Length")
```
